description.english: Complete your first Deathcard.
description.tchinese: 完成你的第一張死亡卡片。
description.french: Concevez votre première carte de mort.
description.italian: Completa la tua prima carta della morte.
description.german: Vervollständige deine erste Todeskarte.
description.spanish: Completa tu primera carta de la muerte.
description.brazilian: Conclua sua primeira carta do ocaso.
description.japanese: はじめて死のカードを完成させる。
description.schinese: 完成你的第一张死亡卡。

description.english: Free a Stinkbug from the safe.
description.french: Libérez une punaise du coffre.
description.italian: Libera una Cimice dalla cassaforte.
description.german: Befreie eine Stinkwanze aus dem Tresor.
description.spanish: Libera una chinche apestosa de la caja fuerte.
description.brazilian: Liberte um Percevejo do cofre.
description.japanese: 金庫からカメムシを解放する。
description.schinese: 从保险箱中放出一只臭虫。

description.english: Free the Wolf Statue from its cage.
description.tchinese: 把狼型雕像從牢籠中放出。
description.french: Libérez la statue du loup de sa cage.
description.italian: Libera la statua del lupo dalla gabbia.
description.german: Befreie die Wolfsstatue aus ihrem Käfig.
description.spanish: Libera a la estatua de lobo de su jaula.
description.brazilian: Liberte a estátua de lobo da jaula.
description.japanese: 檻からオオカミの像を解放する。
description.schinese: 将狼雕像从笼子里释放出来。

description.english: Fill your empty socket with something magical.
description.tchinese: 在空曠的槽位中放入某些魔法物品。
description.french: Remplissez votre récipient vide d'une substance magique.
description.italian: Riempi la tua cavità orbitale con qualcosa di magico.
description.german: Fülle deine leere Augenhöhle mit etwas Magischem.
description.spanish: Llena tu espacio vacío con algo mágico.
description.brazilian: Encaixe algo mágico na sua cavidade ocular.
description.russian: Вставить в пустую глазницу нечто волшебное.
description.turkish: Göz çukurundaki boşluğu sihirli bir şeyle doldur.
description.japanese: 空のソケットに何らかの魔法の力を込める。
description.schinese: 用神奇的物件填满你空洞的眼窝。

description.english: Find a spare film roll.
description.french: Trouvez une pellicule de rechange.
description.italian: Trova un rullino di riserva.
description.german: Finde eine ungenutzte Filmrolle.
description.spanish: Encuentra un rollo de película extra.
description.brazilian: Encontre um rolo de filme sobressalente.
description.japanese: 予備のフィルムロールを見つける。
description.schinese: 找到备用胶卷。

description.english: Defeat Leshy.
description.french: Triomphez de Leshy.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Leshy.
description.german: Besiege Leshy.
description.spanish: Derrota a Leshy.
description.brazilian: Derrote Leshy.
description.japanese: レシーを打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败莱西。

description.english: Start a new game.
description.french: Lancez une nouvelle partie.
description.italian: Inizia una nuova partita.
description.german: Starte ein neues Spiel.
description.spanish: Empieza una partida nueva.
description.brazilian: Inicie um novo jogo.
description.japanese: ニューゲームを始める。
description.schinese: 开始新游戏。

displayName.japanese: 宿命のネクロマンサー

description.english: Complete the Temple of the Dead.
description.french: Venez à bout du temple des âmes défuntes.
description.italian: Completa il Tempio dei Morti.
description.german: Schließe den Tempel der Toten ab.
description.spanish: Completa el Templo de los Muertos.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Templo dos Mortos.
description.japanese: 死者の神殿を攻略する。
description.schinese: 通关死亡神庙。

description.english: Complete the Temple of Beasts.
description.french: Venez à bout du temple des créatures.
description.italian: Completa il Tempio delle Bestie.
description.german: Schließe den Tempel der Bestien ab.
description.spanish: Completa el Templo de las Bestias.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Templo das Feras.
description.japanese: 獣の神殿を攻略する。
description.schinese: 通关野兽神庙。

description.english: Complete the Temple of Technology.
description.french: Venez à bout du temple de la technologie.
description.italian: Completa il Tempio della Tecnologia.
description.german: Schließe den Tempel der Technik ab.
description.spanish: Completa el Templo de la Tecnología.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Templo da Tecnologia.
description.japanese: 技術の神殿を攻略する。
description.schinese: 通关科技神庙。

description.english: Complete the Temple of Magicks.
description.french: Venez à bout du temple de la magie.
description.italian: Completa il Tempio della Magia.
description.german: Schließe den Tempel der Magie ab.
description.spanish: Completa el Templo de la Magia.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Templo da Magia.
description.japanese: 魔法の神殿を攻略する。
description.schinese: 通关魔法神庙。

description.english: Defeat The Prospector.
description.french: Triomphez du chercheur d'or.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Prospettore.
description.german: Besiege den Goldsucher.
description.spanish: Derrota al prospector.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Garimpeiro.
description.japanese: 探鉱者を打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败矿工。

description.english: Defeat The Angler.
description.french: Triomphez du pêcheur.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Pescatore.
description.german: Besiege den Angler.
description.spanish: Derrota al pescador.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Pescador.
description.japanese: 釣り人を打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败钓鱼人。

description.english: Defeat The Trapper and The Trader.
description.french: Triomphez du trappeur et de la marchande.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Cacciatore e la Commerciante.
description.german: Besiege den Fallensteller und die Händlerin.
description.spanish: Derrota al trampero y a la comerciante.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Caçador e a Comerciante.
description.japanese: 罠猟師と商人を打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败猎人和毛皮商。

description.english: Win a battle with damage from Squirrels.
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中用松鼠造成傷害。
description.french: Gagnez une bataille grâce aux dégâts infligés par des écureuils.
description.italian: Vinci una battaglia con danni inflitti dagli Scoiattoli.
description.german: Gewinne einen Kampf mit Schaden durch Eichhörnchen.
description.spanish: Gana una batalla con daño de ardillas.
description.brazilian: Vença uma batalha após causar dano com Esquilos.
description.turkish: Sincapların verdiği hasarla bir savaş kazan.
description.japanese: リスでダメージを与えてバトルに勝利する。
description.schinese: 用松鼠造成伤害赢得一场战斗。

description.english: Allow The Mycologists to experiment on a creature that is already itself an experiment.
description.tchinese: 讓本身就是實驗品的真菌學家在生物上做實驗。
description.french: Autorisez les mycologues à réaliser une expérience sur une créature qui est déjà le résultat d'une expérience.
description.italian: Permetti ai Micologi di fare esperimenti su una creatura che è già un esperimento.
description.german: Lass die Pilzkundler ein Experiment an einer Kreatur durchführen, die bereits Ergebnis eines Experiments ist.
description.spanish: Permite a los micólogos experimentar con una criatura que ya sea un experimento en sí misma.
description.brazilian: Permita que os Micologistas façam um experimento em uma criatura que já seja resultado de um experimento.
description.russian: Позволить Микологам поэкспериментировать над существом, которое уже ложилось под их нож.
description.turkish: Mikologların önceden deney yaptığı bir kartın üzerinde tekrar deney yapmasına izin ver.
description.japanese: 実験から生まれた生物を使って、菌学者たちに実験を行わせる。
description.koreana: 진균학자가 이미 실험을 거친 피조물에게 실험하게 한다.
description.schinese: 允许菌学家在一只本身已经是实验品的造物上进行实验。

description.english: Steal back one of your creatures from The Angler.
description.tchinese: 從釣客那邊把你的生物偷回來。
description.french: Récupérez une créature que le pêcheur vous a volée.
description.italian: Riprenditi una delle tue creature rubate dal Pescatore.
description.german: Stiehl eine deiner Kreaturen vom Angler zurück.
description.spanish: Vuelve a robarle una de tus criaturas al pescador.
description.brazilian: Roube de volta uma de suas criaturas fisgadas pelo Pescador.
description.russian: Отнять у Рыболова одно украденное им существо.
description.turkish: Balıkçı'nın senden çaldığı kartlardan birini geri çal.
description.japanese: 釣り人から自分の生物を盗み返す。
description.schinese: 从钓鱼人那里偷回你的一只造物。

description.english: Allow P03 to gain control of Inscryption.
description.french: Permettez à J03 de prendre le contrôle d'Inscryption.
description.italian: Permetti a P03 di assumere il controllo di Inscryption.
description.german: Lass zu, dass P03 die Kontrolle über Inscryption gewinnt.
description.spanish: Deja que P03 tome el control de Inscryption.
description.brazilian: Permita que P03 assuma o controle do Inscryption.
description.russian: Позволить П03 заполучить контроль над Inscryption.
description.turkish: P03'ün Inscryption'ın kontrolünü ele geçirmesini sağla.
description.japanese: P03にInscryptionの支配権を与える。
description.schinese: 允许P03获得Inscryption的控制权。

description.english: Defeat The Archivist.
description.french: Triomphez de l'archiviste.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'Archivista.
description.german: Besiege die Archivarin.
description.spanish: Derrota a la archivista.
description.brazilian: Derrote a Arquivista.
description.japanese: アーカイビストを打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败档案保管员。

description.english: Defeat The Photographer.
description.french: Triomphez du photographe.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Fotografo.
description.german: Besiege den Fotografen.
description.spanish: Derrota al fotógrafo.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Fotógrafo.
description.japanese: フォトグラファーを打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败照相师。

description.english: Defeat The Unfinished Boss.
description.french: Triomphez du boss inabouti.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Boss Incompiuto.
description.german: Besiege den unfertigen Boss.
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe inacabado.
description.brazilian: Derrote o chefe não terminado.
description.japanese: 未完成のボスを打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败未完成的头目。

description.english: Defeat G0lly.
description.french: Triomphez de S4pristi.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 4ccipicchia.
description.german: Besiege D0nnerl1ttchen.
description.spanish: Derrota a C4ray.
description.brazilian: Derrote C4r4mb4.
description.japanese: フシギを打ち負かす。
description.schinese: 打败乖乖。

description.english: Witness the death of P03.
description.french: Assistez à la mort de J03.
description.italian: Assisti alla morte di P03.
description.german: Erlebe den Tod von P03.
description.spanish: Presencia la muerte de P03.
description.brazilian: Testemunhe a morte de P03.
description.japanese: P03の死を目撃する。
description.schinese: 目睹P03之死。

description.english: Complete the finale of Inscryption.
description.french: Terminez Inscryption.
description.italian: Completa il finale di Inscryption.
description.german: Schließe das Finale von Inscryption ab.
description.spanish: Completa el final de Inscryption.
description.brazilian: Conclua o Inscryption.
description.japanese: Inscryptionのフィナーレを見届ける。
description.schinese: 完成Inscryption的收关任务。

description.english: Collect every card in the Original Inscryption.
description.french: Collectionnez toutes les cartes dans la version originale d'Inscryption.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le carte nell'Inscryption originale.
description.german: Sammle im ursprünglichen Inscryption jede Karte.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las cartas del Inscryption original.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as cartas do Inscryption original.
description.russian: Собрать все карты в оригинальной версии Inscryption.
description.turkish: Orijinal Inscryption'daki tüm kartları elde et.
description.japanese: オリジナルのInscryptionに実装されたカードをすべて集める。
description.schinese: 收齐原版Inscryption中的所有卡牌。

description.english: Attack for over 666 damage in the Original Inscryption.
description.tchinese: 在原版Inscryption中總共造成超過666點傷害。
description.french: Assénez une attaque qui inflige plus de 666 points de dégâts dans la version originale d'Inscryption.
description.italian: Attacca con più di 666 di danno nell'Inscryption originale.
description.german: Greife im ursprünglichen Inscryption mit mehr als 666 Schaden an.
description.spanish: Inflige más de 666 de daño con un ataque en el Inscryption original.
description.brazilian: Cause mais de 666 de dano com um ataque no Inscryption original.
description.russian: Нанести свыше 666 единиц урона за раз в оригинальной версии Inscryption.
description.turkish: Orijinal Inscryption'da tek seferde 666'dan fazla hasar ver.
description.japanese: オリジナルのInscryptionで666以上のダメージを与える。
description.schinese: 在原版Inscryption中造成超过666点攻击。

description.english: Make an offering to The Bonelord.
description.french: Faites une offrande au roi des os.
description.italian: Fai un'offerta al Signore delle Ossa.
description.german: Bring dem Knochenfürsten eine Gabe dar.
description.spanish: Hazle una ofrenda al señor de los huesos.
description.brazilian: Faça uma oferenda ao Lorde Ossário.
description.japanese: 骨の王に捧げものを差し出す。
description.schinese: 向骨王献祭。

description.english: Receive all 5 cards from The Trader in P03's factory.
description.tchinese: 在P03的工廠的商人處收集到全部5張卡片。
description.french: Obtenez les 5 cartes de la marchande dans l'usine de J03.
description.italian: Ricevi tutte e 5 le carte dalla Commerciante nella fabbrica di P03.
description.german: Erhalte von der Händlerin in P03s Fabrik alle 5 Karten.
description.spanish: Recibe las 5 cartas de la comerciante en la fábrica de P03.
description.brazilian: Receba as cinco cartas da Comerciante na fábrica do P03.
description.russian: Получить все 5 карт у Лавочницы на фабрике П03.
description.turkish: P03'ün fabrikasındaki Tüccar'dan 5 kartı da elde et.
description.japanese: P03の工場で、商人のカードを5枚すべて入手する。
description.koreana: P03의 공장에서 상인의 카드 5개를 전부 얻는다.
description.schinese: 从P03工厂的毛皮商那里获得所有5张卡牌。

description.english: Destroy a Level 3 Bounty Hunter card.
description.tchinese: 摧毀一張等級3的賞金獵人卡片。
description.french: Détruisez une carte de mercenaire de niveau 3.
description.italian: Distruggi una carta Cacciatore di taglie di livello 3.
description.german: Zerstöre eine Kopfgeldjäger-Karte der Stufe 3.
description.spanish: Destruye una carta de cazarrecompensas de nivel 3.
description.brazilian: Destrua uma carta de Caçador de Recompensas de nível 3.
description.turkish: 3. Seviye bir Ödül Avcısı kartını yok et.
description.japanese: レベル3の賞金ハンターカードを破壊する。
description.schinese: 摧毁一张3级赏金猎人卡牌。

description.english: Don't empty the Recycling Bin.
description.french: Ne videz pas la corbeille.
description.italian: Non svuotare il bidone per la raccolta differenziata.
description.german: Leere nicht den Papierkorb.
description.spanish: No vacíes el cubo de reciclaje.
description.brazilian: Não esvazie a lixeira.
description.japanese: ゴミ箱を空にしない。
description.schinese: 不要清空回收箱。

description.english: Clear Challenge Level 1 in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Venez à bout du 1er niveau de difficulté du mode Kaycee.exe.
description.italian: Supera la sfida di livello 1 nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Schließe Herausforderungsstufe 1 in Kaycees Mod ab.
description.spanish: Supera el nivel de desafío 1 en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível de desafio 1 no Mod da Kaycee.
description.russian: Успешно преодолеть препятствие 1-го уровня в Моде Кейси.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modのチャレンジレベル1をクリアする。
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中通关挑战关卡1。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中通關挑戰關卡 1。

description.english: Clear Challenge Level 4 in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Venez à bout du 4e niveau de difficulté du mode Kaycee.exe.
description.italian: Supera la sfida di livello 4 nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Schließe Herausforderungsstufe 4 in Kaycees Mod ab.
description.spanish: Supera el nivel de desafío 4 en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível de desafio 4 no Mod da Kaycee.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modのチャレンジレベル4をクリアする。
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中通关挑战关卡4。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中通關挑戰關卡 4。
description.russian: Успешно преодолеть препятствие 4-го уровня в Моде Кейси.

description.english: Clear Challenge Level 8 in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Venez à bout du 8e niveau de difficulté du mode Kaycee.exe.
description.italian: Supera la sfida di livello 8 nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Schließe Herausforderungsstufe 8 in Kaycees Mod ab.
description.spanish: Supera el nivel de desafío 8 en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível de desafio 8 no Mod da Kaycee.
description.russian: Успешно преодолеть препятствие 8-го уровня в Моде Кейси.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modのチャレンジレベル8をクリアする。
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中通关挑战关卡8。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中通關挑戰關卡 8。

description.english: Clear Challenge Level 12 in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Venez à bout du 12e niveau de difficulté du mode Kaycee.exe.
description.italian: Supera la sfida di livello 12 nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Schließe Herausforderungsstufe 12 in Kaycees Mod ab.
description.spanish: Supera el nivel de desafío 12 en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível de desafio 12 no Mod da Kaycee.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modのチャレンジレベル12をクリアする。
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中通关挑战关卡12。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中通關挑戰關卡 12。
description.russian: Успешно преодолеть препятствие 12-го уровня в Моде Кейси.

description.english: Complete a run with every Challenge active in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Dans le mode Kaycee.exe, terminez une partie avec tous les défis.
description.italian: Completa una sessione con tutte le sfide attive nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Schließe in Kaycees Mod einen Durchgang ab, bei dem jede Herausforderung aktiv ist.
description.spanish: Completa una partida con todos los desafíos activos en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma partida com todos os desafios ativos no Mod da Kaycee.
description.russian: Завершить заход со всеми препятствиями сразу в Моде Кейси.
description.turkish: Kaycee'nin Modunda her mücadelenin etkin olduğu bir turu bitir.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modで、すべてのチャレンジを有効にしてランをクリアする。
description.koreana: 케이시 모드에서 모든 챌린지를 활성화한 상태로 도전을 클리어한다.
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中，在激活所有挑战状态下通关一次冒险。
description.tchinese: 在凱曦的模組中啟用所有挑戰項目並完成一輪遊戲。

description.english: Unlock all 3 items from the oil painting in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Dans le mode Kaycee.exe, débloquez les 3 objets de la peinture à l'huile.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti e 3 gli oggetti del dipinto a olio nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Schalte in Kaycees Mod alle 3 Gegenstände aus dem Ölgemälde frei.
description.spanish: Desbloquea los 3 elementos del cuadro al óleo en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie os três itens da pintura a óleo no Mod da Kaycee.
description.turkish: Kaycee'nin Modunda yağlı boya tablosundaki 3 eşyanın da kilidini aç.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modの油絵から、アイテムを3つアンロックする。
description.koreana: 케이시 모드에서 유화에서 아이템 3개를 전부 해금한다.
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中从油画里解锁全部3个道具。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中，從油畫處解鎖全部的 3 種道具。
description.russian: Разблокировать все 3 предмета из картины маслом в Моде Кейси.

description.english: Complete a run with every Starter Deck in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Dans le mode Kaycee.exe, terminez une partie avec chaque deck de départ.
description.italian: Completa una sessione con ciascun mazzo iniziale nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Schließe in Kaycees Mod einen Durchgang mit jedem Startdeck ab.
description.spanish: Completa una partida con todos los mazos iniciales en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Conclua uma partida com todos os baralhos iniciais no Mod da Kaycee.
description.russian: Завершить заход со всеми стартовыми колодами в Моде Кейси.
description.turkish: Kaycee'nin Modunda her Başlangıç Destesi ile bir tur bitir.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modで、すべての初期デッキを使ってランをクリアする。
description.koreana: 케이시 모드에서 모든 시작 덱으로 도전을 클리어한다.
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中，用每种初始牌组通关一次冒险。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中，用每一套起始牌組完成一輪遊戲。

description.english: Make 10 misplays in a single Kaycee's Mod run.
description.french: Dans le mode Kaycee.exe, faites 10 mauvais coups en une seule partie.
description.italian: Fai 10 giocate pessime in una singola sessione della mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Begehe in einem Durchgang von Kaycees Mod 10 Patzer.
description.spanish: Haz 10 jugadas erróneas en una sola partida en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Faça dez jogadas ruins em uma única partida no Mod da Kaycee.
description.turkish: Kaycee'nin Modunda tek bir turda 10 kötü hamle yap.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modの1回のランで10回ミスプレイをする。
description.koreana: 케이시 모드 도전에서 실수를 열 번 한다.
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组的一次冒险中打出10次昏招。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中，於一輪遊戲內犯下10次失誤。
description.russian: Совершить 10 оплошностей за один заход в Моде Кейси.

description.english: Pull out 32 teeth in Kaycee's Mod.
description.french: Dans le mode Kaycee.exe, arrachez-vous 32 dents.
description.italian: Estrai 32 denti nella mod di Kaycee.
description.german: Ziehe in Kaycees Mod 32 Zähne.
description.spanish: Arranca 32 dientes en el mod de Kaycee.
description.brazilian: Arranque 32 dentes no Mod da Kaycee.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modで歯を32個引き抜く。
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中拔掉32颗牙。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中，拔下 32 顆牙齒。

description.english: Defeat Leshy in Kaycee's Mod without destroying The Moon.
description.french: Dans le mode Kaycee.exe, triomphez de Leshy sans détruire la Lune.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Leshy nella mod di Kaycee senza distruggere la Luna.
description.german: Besiege Leshy in Kaycees Mod, ohne den Mond zu zerstören.
description.spanish: Derrota a Leshy en el mod de Kaycee sin destruir la luna.
description.brazilian: Derrote Leshy no Mod da Kaycee sem destruir a lua.
description.turkish: Kaycee'nin Modunda Ay'ı yok etmeden Leshy'yi alt et.
description.japanese: Kaycee's Modで、月を破壊せずにレシーを打ち負かす。
description.koreana: 케이시 모드에서 달을 파괴하지 않고 레쉬를 물리친다.
description.schinese: 在凯茜模组中，不摧毁月亮便打败莱西。
description.tchinese: 在凱茜的模組中擊敗雷希，且不摧毀月亮。
description.russian: Одолеть Лешего в Моде Кейси, не уничтожая при этом Луну.
